attributes.action: Make all parking (including hospital) car parks FREE
attributes.additional_details:
Motorists are having to pay to park their cars/vans when they’re out shopping and we shouldn’t have to pay.

Also, NHS staff have to pay to park their car when going to work and only a few get tickets. No NHS staff should get tickets while they’re working.

Visitors shouldn’t have to pay to park in a hospital car park either, as they would have appointments and/or visiting their family member/friend in hospital.

The money we pay to park go to private companies which is wrong.
attributes.background:
To make all parking FREE for motorists and to make parking FREE in hospital car parks. 

The Government/Parliament have the power to put  this into action.

rejection.details:
Parking restrictions are set by councils and private landowners, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition to encourage councils and private car parks to suspend parking fines: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307972

You may also wish to sign this petition calling for parking at NHS hospitals free for staff in future: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307909

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
